comments:
(sorry, this is still release 1.0, build 137)
Follow these steps:
contribute a popup action against an IResource.
add the following filter.
<filter name="extension" value="cl"/>

Go to the Navigator, create a file called mazen with *no* extension.
You get an internal error, and the following log :

Tod, pls try this in the latest 2.0 builds

Problem still exists in 20020204

I added the following resource action 

<!-- ************** POPUP ACTIONS ******************* -->
<extension
      point="org.eclipse.ui.popupMenus">
   <objectContribution
         objectClass="org.eclipse.core.resources.IResource"
         id="org.eclipse.ui.actioncontributiontest.ResourceContributions"
         adaptable = "true">
      <filter name="extension" value="cl"/>
      <action
            label="Resource Action"
            class="org.eclipse.ui.actioncontributiontest.ResourceAction"
            menubarPath="org.eclipse.ui.OpenFileAction"
            id="resource action">
      </action>
   </objectContribution>
</extension>

And when I clicked on somethig without an extension I got the exception below.

Fixed in build >20020404. We were assuming the extension of every file was non -
 null.
